info.description: API for managing teachers, students, courses, and more in the DZ Skills Online Teaching platform.
info.title: DZ Skills API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all courses

post.description: Create a new course
Retrieve a course by its ID

delete.description: Delete an answer by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all answers from the database

post.description: Get an answer by its ID

put.description: Update an existing answer by its ID

delete.description: Delete an article by its ID

post.description: Get all articles for a specific course

get.description: Retrieve all articles from the database

post.description: Create a new article for a specific course
Get an article by its ID

put.description: Update an existing article by its ID

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all categories with their subcategories

post.description: Create a new category
Get a category by its ID, including its subcategories

put.description: Update an existing category by its ID

post.description: Retrieve all quizzes for a specific course

get.description: Retrieve a list of all quizzes

post.description: Create a new quiz
Retrieve a quiz by its ID
Get the average rating for a specific course
Retrieve a specific rating by course and student IDs
post.summary: Get rating by course and student

post.description: Retrieve all ratings for a specific course
Retrieve all ratings for a specific student
Create a new course rating
Get all quizzes for a specific exam
Create a new exam quiz in the system
Get a specific exam quiz by its ID

delete.description: Delete an exam by its ID

post.description: Get all exams for a specific course

get.description: Retrieve all exams from the database

post.description: Create a new exam in the system
Get a specific exam by its ID

delete.description: Delete a feedback by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all feedbacks from the database

post.description: Create a new feedback in the system
Get a specific feedback by its ID
Get all feedbacks for a specific student
Get all answers for a specific question

get.description: Retrieve a list of all questions

post.description: Create a new question in the system
Retrieve a question by its ID
Submit and grade student exam answers
Create a new student course enrollment
Retrieve a specific student course enrollment

put.description: Update an existing student course enrollment

post.description: Register a new student in the system

delete.description: Delete a student from the system

post.description: Retrieve a student's information by their ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all students

post.description: Authenticate a user (teacher or student) and generate an access token

parameters.description: Login credentials (identifier (email or username) and password)
parameters.name: credentials

delete.description: Delete a subcategory by its ID

post.description: Get all subcategories belonging to a specific category
Create a new subcategory with the provided information
Get a subcategory by its ID
Create a new teacher account with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a teacher by their ID

post.description: Get a teacher by their ID
Authenticate a user (teacher or student) and generate an access token

parameters.description: Login credentials (identifier (email or username) and password)
parameters.name: credentials

delete.description: Delete a video by its ID

post.description: Get all videos belonging to a specific course
Create a new video with the provided information
Get a video by its ID

email.description: Can be either email or username

course_id.description: Ensure that each exam is linked to one course
